description.value:
Appearing as vibrant as the day they were picked, this cluster of flowers is arranged in a small spray, tied with a red satin ribbon. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 41.

  • Armor You gain the ability to speak with flowers, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Speak with Plants].
  • Weapon (disease) After you cast a plant spell by activating the posy, pollen coats your weapon. Your next Strike causes the target to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} on a hit (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit). If the creature attempts to recover, it sneezes rather than retching (rolling against the spellheart's spell DC). If you don't make a Strike by the end of your next turn, the pollen becomes inert. Plant creatures are immune.

Activate Cast a Spell
